column4: i ran sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop and the error was couldnt find package ubuntu-desktop
no im trying to install gnome IndyGunFreak, i dont have it yet
thats what i thought...but it didnt work
and when i try to update it says could not resolve us.archive.ubuntu.com
i have my router and modem set up and the other comps have wireless
the ubuntu server isnt, its running through a wireless router
i restarted the networking service though so shouldnt it work?
how can i check if i have an internet connection?
do you have the hardware connected at this time?
and the results of:  ip a  pastebin'd?
make sure they can use sudo
